app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Professional Translator
app_description: Professional Translator is the must have app if you need to switch between languages frequently or have a huge interest in new languages. We also provide VPN Servers for users users can surf and entertain. Basic Features: Support real time translation in more than 100 languages. Various translation modes including text voice and OCR. Simple and beautiful translation interface. VPN Server: Proxy Servers provided. Text to Text: Easily enter text to translate into several languages. Voice to Voice: Speak in your language and get the corresponding translation. Camera to Text: Advanced scanning technology easily extracts text from pictures and translates them. Text to Voice: You can choose to have your translated text output by voice.
